column1: '''Unwin Hyman Ltd.''' is a british publisher of numerous books by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and calendars. Unwin Hyman was formed in 1986
column2: as a result of amalgamated of [[Allen & Unwin]] company and Bell & Hyman.[[Robin Hyman]] became chief executive and Allen & Unwin was an Australia-based
column3: child company of Unwin Hyman.Later Hyman sold the firm to HarperCollins. [[HarperCollins]] has since sold Unwin Hyman's academic book list to Routledge.
